tourDetails: Embark on an adventurous hiking expedition to conquer the challenging mountain peaks. Explore breathtaking landscapes and panoramic views.

tourPlan.description: Arrival and Base Camp Setup - Settle in and prepare for the upcoming adventure amidst the mountainous terrain.
Hike to Summit - Conquer the highest peaks and witness awe-inspiring vistas.
Explore Surrounding Trails - Discover hidden gems along scenic trails.
Descend and Departure - Descend with memories of an exhilarating expedition.

tourDetails: Discover the wonders of nature on a scenic hiking trail through lush forests. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of the wilderness.

tourPlan.description: Arrival and Trail Exploration - Unwind amidst the serene forest trails.
Hike Through Forest Canopy - Traverse through dense canopies and witness diverse flora and fauna.
Wildlife Spotting - Encounter local wildlife on a guided nature walk.
Departure - Bid farewell to the enchanting forest.

tourDetails: Embark on a thrilling wildlife safari adventure. Encounter exotic animals in their natural habitat and capture unforgettable moments.

tourPlan.description: Arrival and Safari Introduction - Get introduced to the safari and its inhabitants.
Full-Day Safari Experience - Explore the vast wildlife reserves on a full-day safari.
Guided Nature Walk - Discover hidden trails and learn about local flora and fauna.
Farewell and Departure - Bid adieu to the wildlife paradise.

tourDetails: Enjoy a leisurely walking tour along the coast, taking in the fresh sea breeze and stunning ocean views.

tourPlan.description: Coastal Arrival and Sunset Walk - Begin your coastal retreat with a relaxing sunset stroll.
Beachside Exploration - Explore the coastline and its charming surroundings.
Relaxation Day - Unwind with a day of leisure by the seaside.
Departure - Bid farewell to the coastal paradise.

tourDetails: Embark on a walking tour through historic city streets, exploring architectural marvels and cultural landmarks.

tourPlan.description: Arrival and City Orientation - Immerse yourself in the historical charm of the city.
Historical Landmarks Tour - Explore iconic landmarks and learn about their rich history.
Local Cuisine Tasting - Indulge in the flavors of the city's culinary delights.
Departure - Bid adieu to the historic cityscape.

tourDetails: Relax on pristine beaches, bask in the sun, and enjoy the soothing sounds of the ocean waves on this coastal retreat.

tourPlan.description: Beach Arrival and Leisure Day - Begin your coastal escape with a day of relaxation by the shore.
Water Activities and Beachfront Dining - Enjoy water adventures and savor beachfront dining.
Relaxation and Sunset Yoga - Unwind with sunset yoga sessions by the beach.
Departure - Bid farewell to the sun-soaked paradise.
